metadata.title: Convert WebP to PNG - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert WebP images to PNG format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. Preserve transparency and quality. 100% free and private.

hero.desc: Convert WebP to PNG online for free. Simply drop your WebP images below to convert them to PNG in seconds.

intro.title: Transparency Support
intro.content: PNG format supports transparency, making it ideal for graphics, logos, and images that need transparent backgrounds. Convert your WebP images to PNG for better compatibility.

scenes.title: Graphic Design
scenes.desc: Convert WebP to PNG for design software compatibility.

faq.a: Yes, PNG supports transparency, so transparent areas will be preserved.
PNG is a lossless format, so quality is fully preserved.
